comment.body: thx, looks like an awesome client. I usually don't use my android device for torrenting, but it's always nice to have some handy open source tool on your phone when you need them :)
@Musickiller: Nice. I already used Flud 2 years ago on my trip to Austria to download some anime in the hotel :P LibreTorrent definitely looks nice too.

@Musickiller: As long as a torrent client can do the basic stuff it is good enough. Integrated videoplayers are nice for watching movies while downloading or integrated proxies. Most clients offer most of the same functionality. There are some clients like tribler standing out of the masses. Though that one is not available for android as far as i know.
